text: Afternoon everybody. Looking for some help using the single send API. I have 2 custom-coded actions to send an email using the single send API. In their sandbox, everything works as expected, but in the live portal, it's not sending the email. The only difference in the code between the 2 is the access token and the email ID. I'm not getting an error either. Its saying it sends successfully, but nothing actually gets sent. Is there anything that I might be overlooking?
